alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Canadian (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 29 at 10:18AM CDT until August 29 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Blaine County in northwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Canadian County in central Oklahoma... * Until 1100 AM CDT. * At 1018 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles east of Greenfield, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Greenfield. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
